Description: Rating of how much the participants liked Pepper, from 0 (not at all) to 5 (very much)
Rating of how anthropomorphic participants found Pepper, from 0 (not at all) to 5 (very much)
Rating of how intelligent participants perceived Pepper to be, from 0 (not intelligent at all) to 5 (very intelligent)
Negative Attitude toward Robots subscale 1 (interaction with robots), higher score = more negative; total of six questions on a scale of 1 - 5, max score 30
Negative Attitude toward Robots subscale 2 (social influence of robots), higher score = more negative; total of five questions on a scale of 1 - 5, max score 25
Negative Attitude toward Robots subscale 3 (emotions in interactions with robots), higher score = more negative; total of three questions on a scale of 1 - 5, max score 15
